wikipedia_page.main: Dan Fish (born 19 December 1990) is a Welsh rugby union player. Originally a full-back, he played club rugby for the Cardiff Rugby  and Cardiff RFC, having previously played for Glamorgan Wanderers RFC. Fish was capped at Wales Under-20 level and played regularly as a fly-half. He retired in 2021.
